title: (x) KNI bold script logo - Eclat {Patricia, Marc O}
content:
Here’s another great font... three letters to go on this time !  
Anyone have any suggestions to what font this is ???  
Thanks Ans

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206012817im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/kni_01_5934.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Empire logo serif face - Palatino {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206012817/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35268 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Basic serif all-caps font - Times {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206012817/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35275 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ans

comments.content: Sheesh, the number of times we’ve seen the kni logo… If you know what you’re looking for, first do a [search](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206012817/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20kni). ;^)
